flow.descriptionCdata:
9b228539-ceaf-4961-9d77-b7e8f9240382.01e843c9-4dc6-4e46-926a-4efa79aa86c0.description=Adds a value into the global context (available to all parent and child flows) Input Parameters\: keyName - the name of the context variable to use myValue - the value to assign the context variable Responses\: Done - assigned the context variable Scriptlet Example\: [$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue]; 9b228539-ceaf-4961-9d77-b7e8f9240382.1b46c640-02d5-405d-ae5a-553ad30e29ce.description=
Change the status of a Windows service to the requested status.

Inputs\:
host - Hostname or ip address of the target machine.
service - Name of service to change.
requestedstatus - (running, stopped, paused) requested service status.
user - Username to use for thread impersonation on the RAS host for this operation (can be left blank).
password - Password of the user.
startdependants - (true, false) start all dependant services.
serviceTimeout - The amount of time, in seconds, a single service is allowed to take (it affects the main service and the dependant services).
operationTimeout - The total amount of time, in seconds, the operation is allowed to take for all services combined.

Responses\:
service paused - The service is currently paused.
service running - The service is currently running.
service stopped - The service is currently stopped.
service pending - The service is currently pending.
failure - There was a problem setting the state of the service.
9b228539-ceaf-4961-9d77-b7e8f9240382.39ff10e5-046b-4ff1-ab9f-c501e9a9a461.description=
Changes the status of a Windows service to the requested status.

Inputs\:
host - The hostname or ip address of the target machine.
service - The name of the service to change.
requestedstatus - The requested service status. Valid values are\: running, stopped, paused.
user - The username to use for thread impersonation on the RAS host for this operation (Example\: domain\username). 
password - The password of the user.
startdependants - Start all dependant services. Valid values are\: true, false.
serviceTimeout - The amount of time, in seconds, a single service is allowed to take (it affects the main service and the dependant services).
operationTimeout - The total amount of time, in seconds, the operation is allowed to take for all services combined.

Responses\:
service paused - The service is currently paused.
service running - The service is currently running.
service stopped - The service is currently stopped.
service pending - The service is currently pending.
failure - There was a problem setting the state of the service.
9b228539-ceaf-4961-9d77-b7e8f9240382.3aec1056-0c36-4738-bd26-ce9d584cd79f.prompt=HostName\: 9b228539-ceaf-4961-9d77-b7e8f9240382.3f60f86e-7a25-41e4-b8bf-65a5ac8919ea.description=Adds a value into the global context (available to all parent and child flows) Input Parameters\: keyName - the name of the context variable to use myValue - the value to assign the context variable Responses\: Done - assigned the context variable Scriptlet Example\: [$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue]; 9b228539-ceaf-4961-9d77-b7e8f9240382.45b989e8-6d0f-4596-a67e-dad4834a18eb.prompt=UserName\: 9b228539-ceaf-4961-9d77-b7e8f9240382.85a8cac0-c408-456c-9c08-7107de5b776a.prompt=Service\: 9b228539-ceaf-4961-9d77-b7e8f9240382.aaf5a338-ab39-4069-91c8-bfdc0dc8a210.description=Adds a value into the global context (available to all parent and child flows) Input Parameters\: keyName - the name of the context variable to use myValue - the value to assign the context variable Responses\: Done - assigned the context variable Scriptlet Example\: [$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue]; 9b228539-ceaf-4961-9d77-b7e8f9240382.bbeca1d7-be76-4577-b3f2-c4b7e9efda3d.description=Sleeps for 30 seconds 9b228539-ceaf-4961-9d77-b7e8f9240382.bc814f31-9110-4c42-acb4-f1d79b387432.prompt=Password\: 9b228539-ceaf-4961-9d77-b7e8f9240382.ca067480-846b-4d4f-af87-d654d431f8f5.description=
Changes the status of a Windows service to the requested status.

Inputs\:
host - The hostname or ip address of the target machine.
service - The name of the service to change.
requestedstatus - The requested service status. Valid values are\: running, stopped, paused.
user - The username to use for thread impersonation on the RAS host for this operation (Example\: domain\username). 
password - The password of the user.
startdependants - Start all dependant services. Valid values are\: true, false.
serviceTimeout - The amount of time, in seconds, a single service is allowed to take (it affects the main service and the dependant services).
operationTimeout - The total amount of time, in seconds, the operation is allowed to take for all services combined.

Responses\:
service paused - The service is currently paused.
service running - The service is currently running.
service stopped - The service is currently stopped.
service pending - The service is currently pending.
failure - There was a problem setting the state of the service.
9b228539-ceaf-4961-9d77-b7e8f9240382.description=
Restarts a Windows service. This service must be set to start in Automatic or Manual mode. Services set to Disabled cannot be restarted using this operation. All the services that the given service depends on will also be restarted. 
The given host must have the Server service (LanManServer) running in order for the flow to work. For this reason, if you try to restart this service the flow will stop it, but won`t be able to start it again. 

Inputs\:
host 	- The host on which the service resides.
service 	- The service to restart.
altuser 	- The username to use when authenticating with host (Example\: domain\username).
altpass 	- The password to use when authenticating with host.

Responses\:
success 		- Service restarted successfully.
failure 		- Service could not be restarted.
service failed to restart 	- Service was stopped, but would not restart.
service didn't stop 	- Service failed to stop.

Extra Results\:
serviceRestartResult - The return code of the service restart operation.
9b228539-ceaf-4961-9d77-b7e8f9240382.f2c5c7c4-31c2-4135-9195-507e47c9c6cb.description=Adds a value into the global context (available to all parent and child flows) Input Parameters\: keyName - the name of the context variable to use myValue - the value to assign the context variable Responses\: Done - assigned the context variable Scriptlet Example\: [$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue];
flow.name: Restart Windows Service

scriptlet.name: Step Set Flow Variable in Flow Restart Windows Service (f447378e-5aba-4ed5-a650-fa7e75ef8aa7)
